subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Mauer hit a grand slam and two doubles and drove in a career-high six runs as the Twins routed the White Sox, 20-1, matching the most lopsided loss in team history.
snippet: Joe Mauer hit a grand slam and two doubles and drove in a career-high six runs as the Twins routed the White Sox, 20-1, matching the most lopsided loss in team history.
